title: [1.15.2]data指令可以模拟生物扣血吗？需要怎样写呢？
author: 涂山薇雪233
txt_content: 想知道能不能用data指令让生物扣除一定生命值，如果可以的话希望能够告诉我那指令得怎么写

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add mob_health dummy

/execute as 生物 store result score @s mob_health run data get entity @s Health 1000
/execute as 生物 run scoreboard players remove @s mob_health <要扣的血量*1000>
/execute as 生物 store result entity @s Health double 0.001 run scoreboard players get @s mob_health

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add h dummy
/scoreboard players set #5 h 5

/execute as @e[tag=x] store result score @s h run data get entity @s Health
/execute as @e[tag=x]  run scoreboard players operation @s h -= #5 h
/execute as @e[tag=x] store result entity @s Health 1 run scoreboard players get @s h
